key.camping.cycle_tool: Swap Tool or Change Hose Mode
action.camping.unequip_nospace: Can't add the backpack to the inventory, because there's no space for it.
action.camping.deploy_sleeping_bag: Can't deploy the sleeping bag! Check the surrounding area.
information.camping.backpack_coords: Your backpack has been placed at X: %s Y: %s Z: %s
information.camping.backpack_drop: There's no space for backpack. Dropping backpack item at X: %s Y: %s Z: %s
screen.camping.equip_integration: Integration enabled - put backpack in back slot
screen.camping.unequip_integration: Integration enabled - take backpack from back slot
screen.camping.quick_stack_shift: Hold shift: Quick stacks items from hotbar too
screen.camping.transfer_to_backpack_shif: Hold shift: Moves items from hotbar too
screen.camping.unsortable:
Enter select mode
§7Choose which slots won't be affected by sorting
§7Left click to select slot
§7Right click to unselect slot
screen.camping.memory:
Enter select mode
§7Choose slot with item to reserve place for this item
§7Left click to select slot
§7Right click to unselect slot
screen.camping.crafting_to_player: Shift Click Result Into Player's Inventory
obtain.camping.bat: Backpack obtainable in Mineshafts and Dungeons
obtain.camping.iron_golem: Backpack obtainable in Armourer villager's chests
obtain.camping.villager: Can only be acquired by buying it from a Librarian villager
ability.camping.hold_shift: Hold shift for special ability description
ability.camping.emerald: Gives some cool particles, nothing special
ability.camping.lapis: Chance to multiply amount of experience which is received by player
ability.camping.redstone: Redstone block in a form of a backpack. Provides strong redstone signal
ability.camping.bookshelf: Holds mighty knowledge, place around enchanting table just like the bookshelf to get higher-level enchantments!
ability.camping.sponge: Works like sponge block and stores water in backpack tanks. It is required to have empty or not fully water filled tanks for ability to work
ability.camping.cake: Feeds you slowly with delicious pieces of cake
ability.camping.cactus: Acts like real-life cacti, If it's raining and above backpack is clear sky, the backpack will fill empty tanks with water over time. If you want some more water, dip yourself! The backpack can fill with water while being a block too
ability.camping.melon: Can drop up to 3 melon slices when harvested
ability.camping.pumpkin: Staring at the enderman no longer makes him angry
ability.camping.creeper: If player is going to die, creates explosion which damages every creature around, granting player absorption, regeneration and fire protection effects. Ability is available every few minutes
ability.camping.dragon: Backpack for real warriors, combines Magmas Cube's and Squid's backpack abilities, plus gives you strength and regeneration! You'll be invincible!... but... what did it cost?
ability.camping.blaze: Immunity to fall damage and small fireballs sent by blaze
ability.camping.ghast: Ghasts see you as an allay, unless you attack them
ability.camping.spider: Have you ever tried climbing walls?
ability.camping.bat: Provides seeing in the dark! Batman Batman Batman
ability.camping.bee: Attacking creatures stings them causing poisoning, which lasts 4 seconds
ability.camping.ocelot: If nearby hostile mob, grants speed effect
ability.camping.chicken: Have you ever wanted to be a chicken? No? Well, now you are! You'll lay eggs!
ability.camping.squid: Grants water breathing and night vision effects while being in water
item.camping.blank_upgrade_tooltip: Shift click on placed backpack to reset to default settings - removes excessive fluids in tank and scatters items and upgrades around backpack
item.camping.tier_upgrade_tooltip: Use Leather as template and combine with %s tier Traveller's Backpack in Smithing Table to apply upgrade
item.camping.crafting_upgrade_tooltip: Provides Crafting Grid for backpack. Use Leather as template and combine with Traveller's Backpack in Smithing Table to apply upgrade
